function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on housing prices","Impact":"Decrease in housing prices for properties that do not meet new requirements. Potential long-term impact on real estate market.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to track and understand the long-term effects. Develop strategies to adapt real estate properties to new preferences.","Technologies":"Data analytics, real estate market tracking tools, virtual property tours.","People":"Real estate investors, property owners, buyers.","Owner":"Real estate companies, market analysts, government agencies."},{"Description":"Regional differences in housing preferences","Impact":"Failure to adapt real estate properties to regional preferences may lead to decreased demand and prices.","Mitigation":"Conduct local surveys to understand regional preferences and adjust real estate offerings accordingly.","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analytics, market research software.","People":"Real estate developers, property owners, buyers.","Owner":"Real estate companies, market analysts, government agencies."},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on real estate markets","Impact":"Decrease in demand for properties that do not meet new preferences, leading to decreased prices and financial losses for investors.","Mitigation":"Adapt existing properties to meet new requirements, invest in properties with new preferences, and conduct thorough market research to understand the changes.","Technologies":"Data analytics, market research tools, virtual property tours.","People":"Real estate investors, property owners, buyers.","Owner":"Real estate companies, market analysts, government agencies."}]}
